      • ExtensionValues

        public ExtensionValues​(Schema extensionSchema,
                       com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode extNode,
                       IBulkIdResolver bulkIdResolver)
                throws ConflictException,
                       SchemaException,
                       java.text.ParseException
        Creates a value container for Extension Schema Attributes
        Parameters:
        extensionSchema - A Schema object containing the definitions for the Extension Schema
        extNode - A JsonNode object holding the extension attributes
        bulkIdResolver - A resolver used to resolve temporary IDs in bulkoperations
        Throws:
        ConflictException - may be thrown by ValueUtil parser
        SchemaException - may be thrown by ValueUtil parser
        java.text.ParseException - may be thrown by ValueUtil parser

      • addValue

        public void addValue​(@NotNull
                     @NotNull Attribute attribute,
                     @NotNull
                     @NotNull Value val)
              throws SchemaException
        Adds a value to the extension object. If the attribute is a multi-value, it will add the value.
        Parameters:
        attribute - The name of the attribute or sub-attribute to add
        val - The Value to add
        Throws:
        SchemaException - occurs when adding an incompatible value.

      • putValue

        public void putValue​(@NotNull
                     @NotNull Attribute attribute,
                     @NotNull
                     @NotNull Value val)
              throws SchemaException
        Replaces the existing value object with the new one. If MultiValue, replaces the entire set of values.
        Parameters:
        attribute - The definition of the attribute value to be added
        val - The Value to be added
        Throws:
        SchemaException - is thrown when attempting to replace an incompatible Value type.
